[boy] Evan.
What?
It's Zoe Murphy in that hot band shirt you love so much.

translation.en: Can you just-- Can you please stop?
Well, hey, maybe she's into you too.
Maybe you should talk to her, tell her how you feel.
I've tried talking to her.
Really?
Yes-- Yeah, I--
I stayed afterwards last year, after the spring jazz band concert,

translation.en: but, um, I didn't go up to her because I was worried that my hands were sweaty.
translation.ko: 손에 땀 찼을까 봐 못 다가가겠더라

translation.en: Which they weren't even that sweaty. I just--
I was worried they were sweaty and worrying makes them sweaty.
translation.ko: 걱정이 되더라고 그러면 진짜 땀이 차

translation.en: So I just went to the bathroom and I put 'em under the hand dryer thing,

I was kidding.
You obviously should not talk to her. You are a literal disaster.
translation.ko: 너 쟤한테 말 걸었다간 완전 망하겠다

translation.en: Go, Bobcats!
Go, Bobcats.
So awesome. So awesome, everyone. Phenomenal, really.

translation.en: -[laughter] -So, what happened to your arm, exactly?
I was climbing a tree and I fell. It was stupid.
You fell out of a tree? What are you, five?
Well, um…
So, actually, I worked this summer
as an apprentice park ranger at Ellison State Park.
It's a funny story though, because…
there was ten minutes, after I fell,
where I just lay there on the ground, waiting for someone to come get me.
I was like, "Any second now." You know?
I was saying to myself, "Any second now. Here they come." So…
Did they?
No. Nobody came. That's the, um-- That's what's funny.
translation.ko: 아니, 아무도 안 왔어 그게 웃긴 포인트지

translation.en: That's not funny.
Model UN.
Well, anyways, um… How was-- Did you… How was camp?
Well, I put on 13 pounds of pure muscle.
Also, I hooked up with this Brazilian dude who is literally a supermodel.
translation.ko: 브라질 남자랑 썸도 탔지 슈퍼모델 같은 애랑

translation.en: So, yeah, hope that answers your question.
So let's have Mother Nature's back so that she'll have ours.

translation.en: All right, thank you, Alana. Very inspirational.

translation.en: Hey, um…
would you wanna sign my cast?
You could-- You could be the first.
Why would I do that?

We're family friends, Evan. That's an entirely different thing.
translation.ko: 가족끼리 친구지, 에반 그건 엄연히 달라

translation.en: Please respect that.
Connor, I'm loving this manicure. It's very school shooter chic.
translation.ko: 코너, 매니큐어 멋지네 총기 난사범 같다

translation.en: -You're such an idiot. -That is so not a joke.
You think that's funny?
What? No. Not at all.
[shouting] Then stop laughing!
[Zoe] Hey.
I'm sorry about my brother. He's a psycho.
translation.ko: 오빠 대신 사과할게 저 인간 사이코야

translation.en: Evan, right?
Evan…
That's your-- That's your name.
Yeah, it is. It is. Sorry. It's Evan.
It's Evan. I'm sorry.
Why are you sorry?
'Cause you said Evan, and then I said it, you know?
I just repeated it, which is, um…
That's just really annoying when people do that, so…
I'm Zoe.
It's a-- I should-- I think-- Sorry.
[Evan] Dear Evan Hansen,
Turns out this wasn't an amazing day after all.
This isn't gonna be an amazing week or an amazing year, because why would it be?
translation.ko: 이제 멋진 일주일 멋진 일 년도 물 건너간 거야

translation.en: Oh, I know. Because there's Zoe.
Who I don't even know, and who doesn't know me, but…
translation.ko: 난 걜 잘 모르고 걔도 날 몰라, 하지만

translation.en: maybe if I did, maybe if I could just talk to her.
Maybe things would be better.
Or…
maybe nothing would be different at all.
I wish everything was different.
I wish I was different.
I wish I was part of something.
I wish that anything I said mattered to anyone.
translation.ko: 누구라도 내 말에 귀 기울여주면 좋겠어

translation.en: But it doesn't, and it never did…
translation.ko: 하지만 아무도 내 말을 듣지 않아

translation.en: and it never will.
I mean, face it, would anyone even notice if I just disappeared tomorrow?
translation.ko: 내가 내일 사라진다 해도 아무도 못 알아차릴걸?

translation.en: Sincerely, your best and most dearest friend, me.
translation.ko: 너의 가장 가깝고 소중한 친구 나로부터

translation.en: Hey. What happened to your arm?
I was climbing a tree and I fell.
You fell out of a tree?
That's the saddest thing I've ever heard.
I know.
So-- Sorry, um, I think I accidentally printed something.
Yeah, we're all waiting.
Um, no one signed your cast.
-No, I know. -I'll sign it.
-You don't-- You really don't have to-- -Do you have a Sharpie or…
I don't. Shoot.
Here's one.
Nice.
Wow, that's great.
Now we can both pretend we have friends.
translation.ko: 이제 서로 친구인 척할 수 있겠다

translation.en: -"Dear Evan Hansen." Here you go. -Yeah, that's mine.
That's mine. I can take it. Sorry.
"Because there's Zoe"…
Is this about my sister?
What? No, no. Who's-- Who's your sister?
-You wanted me to find this? -What?
You saw I was here, so you started writing this,
translation.ko: 내가 여기 있는 걸 보고 이걸 썼고

translation.en: -and you started talking to me. -No, you started talking to me.
So that I would read some creepy shit about my sister and freak out, right?
translation.ko: 동생에 관한 소름 돋는 글 보고 열받으라고, 맞지?

translation.en: -Why would I do that? -So you can tell everyone that I'm crazy.
Right? Right?
Gentlemen! Shh.
No, I really--
Look, I really need that back.
So-- Look, can you please just give it back?
Just please don't show it to anyone.
Connor!
Come on.
Shit. Shit.
-Hi. -Hi, honey, I'm so sorry.
Erica called in at the last minute with a stomach bug,
and there's only one other nurse on tonight.
So I volunteered to take her shift. I hope you weren't waiting for me to eat.
translation.ko: 내가 대타하기로 했어 같이 저녁 먹으려고 기다렸어?

translation.en: -No, I already ate. -Um, it's just,
they announced more budget cuts this morning,
so anything I can do to show that I'm a team player, you know?
-How was your day? -Fine.
It was-- It was pretty good.
Yeah? You know, I texted with Meera this morning,
and she said Jared was really looking forward to seeing you and reconnecting.
translation.ko: 재러드가 너랑 다시 친해지고 싶어 한대

translation.en: I thought that was nice.
Yeah, he's so nice.
-How was Dr. Sherman? -Pretty good.
Any change to your meds?
Um, no.
Oh, God. Here he comes. All right, I--
All right, love you. Bye.
-Okay, I love you… -[line beeping] ...too.
[Jared] A letter to yourself.
What is that, like some kind of sex thing?
No. No, it's not a sex thing.
-It was an assignment from my therapist. -Ew.
Why are you telling me this?
I didn't know who to tell. You're my only… family friend.
That's sad.
Look, Connor isn't here again today. That's three days in a row.
translation.ko: 코너가 오늘도 안 왔어 벌써 사흘째야

translation.en: He hasn't done anything with it yet, put it online or whatever.
Because I've… I've been checking.
So, you know, maybe he just-- Maybe he forgot, right?
Right. Right.
Or maybe he didn't, because he's definitely gonna put it online.
Dude, Connor Murphy is batshit.
Remember when he threw a printer at Mrs. G in the second grade
because he couldn't be line leader?
He was seven.
Just imagine what he's capable of now.
[woman on PA] Evan Hansen, report to Mr. Howard's office.
Oh, damn.
Evan.
Connor Murphy's mother and stepfather are here to see you.
translation.ko: 코너 머피의 어머니와 새아버지가 널 보러 오셨다

translation.en: They want to speak in private.
Hi.
Hello.
Why don't you go ahead, honey?
I'm going as fast as I can.
Well, that's not what I said, is it?
This is--
Connor wanted you to have this.
[man] We didn't know you were friends.
Well, we didn't think Connor had any friends, frankly.
translation.ko: 코너에겐 친구가 전혀 없는 줄 알았거든

translation.en: And then we see this note, and it seems to suggest pretty clearly
that you and Connor were… or at least, for Connor--
"Dear Evan Hansen."
He addressed it to you. He wrote it to you.
These are the words that he wanted to share with you.
translation.ko: 너한테 하고 싶은 얘길 쓴 거지

translation.en: His last words.
Connor took his own life.
[whispers] He what?
This is all we found with him.
He had it folded up in his pocket.
But this is--
I'm sorry. Connor didn't-- [sighs] He didn't write this.
translation.ko: 죄송한데 이건 코너가 쓴 게 아니에요

translation.en: Connor didn't write this.
What… What does that mean?
Well, he's obviously in shock.
-If Connor didn't write this-- -[Evan] I'm sorry.
-I should probably go, please. -No, you don't understand.
This is all that we have. This is the only thing that we have left.
-Cynthia, listen to me. -No, don't-- Don't go.
Okay, then you take it. Please take it.
No. No, don't go. Don't. Please stay. Please.
translation.ko: 아냐, 가지 마, 조금만 더 있어 줘

translation.en: His best and most dearest friend.
-Oh, my God. -That's-- That's Connor.
-Connor? -Connor Murphy?
-[bell rings] -Holy shit.
They invited me for dinner.
They wanna know more stuff about Connor and me, about our… friendship.
translation.ko: 더 알고 싶대 코너와 나의… 우정에 대해

translation.en: -And you said yes? -I froze.
What are you gonna tell them?
I mean, the truth.
I don't know, man. Are you really gonna tell these people
that the only thing they have left of their son
is a sex letter that you wrote to yourself?
Hey. I'm so sorry.
What the hell was that?
I don't know.
Oh, my God. They were so sad, his parents.
I mean, his mom was just…
I've never seen anyone so sad before.
I have to tell them.
You're early.
Oh, s… Sorry.
Sit.
I hope you're hungry.
So… you and Connor.
You probably spent a lot of time together, I bet.
So… Not-- Not really, actually.
-The thing is that I-- -We looked through his phone.
His texts, emails. We didn't find anything from you.
translation.ko: 문자랑 이메일도… 근데 너한테 온 건 없더라

translation.en: -Yeah, no, I know. I know. -He set up different accounts.
Ones we couldn't find.
He knew you read his emails.
Well, somebody had to be the bad guy.
Well, if you did have any emails or conversations
between the two of you, we'd love to see anything.
-Well-- -Yeah, it's-- It's weird.
The only time I saw you two together
translation.ko: 내가 둘이 있는 걸 본 건

translation.en: was when he was screaming in your face at school last week.
He was screaming at you?
Yeah, yeah--
Well, that wasn't very nice.
Well, Connor wasn't very nice, so that actually makes sense.
I think that everybody at this table can agree that Connor was, um…
a complicated person.
No, he was a bad person.
Zoe, please.
Don't pretend like you don't agree with me.
[Cynthia] You refuse to remember any of the good things.
translation.ko: 왜 꼭 나쁜 점만 기억하려고 해?

translation.en: Because there were no good things.
What were the good things?
I'm not having this conversation in front of our guest.
[Zoe] No, tell us the good things.
What were the good things? Family day at Sunny Glen?
translation.ko: 뭐가 좋았는데요? 치료센터에 면회 간 거?

translation.en: Zoe! This is not the time.
-Who knew rehab could be so much fun? -There were good things!
I'm not the only one. You remember, right?
translation.ko: 나만 그런 거 아니잖아 너도 좋은 기억 많지?

translation.en: Right. Yeah, of course. Yes, of course there were good things.
Tell us something. Please, Evan.
Right, um…
Connor and I…
I don't know, um…
We had a really great-- We had a really great time together…
this one day recently.
That's something good that I remember. That day.
Yeah, that awesome day at the…
um, trees.
-Trees? -Never mind, never mind.
I'm sorry, I don't--
I shouldn't have said anything and I knew it was stupid--
You don't mean the orchard, do you?
He took you to the apple orchard?
When?
Once. Just-- Just once. That once.
I thought that place closed years ago.
translation.ko: 거긴 몇 년 전에 문 닫았는데?

translation.en: Well, the hiking trails are still open though, aren't they?
We used to go to the orchard all of the time. We'd do picnics there.
translation.ko: 우린 그 농장에 소풍을 자주 갔었어

translation.en: Do you remember that, Zoe?
Yeah, I do.
And you and Connor would fly that little toy plane
until you crashed it into the creek.
That was an emergency landing.
I can't believe that he took you there.
I bet you had fun. I bet the two of you…
I bet that was fun.
Yeah.
We did. We did. The whole day.
It was just…
♪ End of May or early June ♪ ♪ This picture-perfect Afternoon we shared ♪
translation.ko: 5월 말인가 6월 초의 어느 날 우린 멋진 오후를 함께 보냈죠

translation.en: What was the name of that ice cream place that we loved?
translation.ko: 우리 단골 아이스크림 가게 이름이 뭐였지?

translation.en: Gifford's?
-A La Mode. -[Cynthia] That's it!
A La Mode. And they had this homemade hot fudge.

And we'd sit in that meadow by the pine trees

translation.en: ♪ Like buddies do ♪
♪ Quoting songs By our favorite bands ♪
♪ Telling jokes no one understands ♪ ♪ Except us two ♪

♪ All we see is sky For forever ♪

♪ Feels like we could go on For forever this way ♪
♪ Two friends on a perfect day ♪
I'd completely forgotten about that place.

♪ We walk a while and talk about ♪
♪ The things we'll do When we get out of school ♪

translation.en: ♪ Wouldn't that be cool? ♪
